title: CHILDREN:  Provides relative to gestational carrier contracts. (gov sig)

title: COURTS:  Provides for minimum standards for elevator access to multistory courthouses for the disabled community. (8/1/18) (EN SEE FISC NOTE GF EX See Note)

title: COMMERCIAL REGULATIONS:  Requires companies who sell DNA testing kits to inform a purchaser of certain information. (8/1/18)
LOCAL AGENCIES:  Authorizes investigative powers to the Jefferson Parish Inspector General's Office relative to the Jefferson Parish School Board. (8/1/18)
CHILDREN/CUSTODY: Provides relative to an award of custody to a person other than a parent

MOTOR VEHICLES: Provides authority for the commissioner of the OMV to waive any penalty, procedure, or requirement for failure to maintain insurance provided that the principal driver of the motor vehicle is the registered owner or owner's spouse or child who was in the hospital or has died, and the owner can provide such proof to the commissioner. (gov sig) (EN SEE FISC NOTE SG EX See Note)
MEDICAID: Provides relative to Medicaid coverage of certain behavioral health services
COASTAL PROTECT/RES AUTH:  Requires the Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority Board to develop a coastal master plan, at a minimum every six years.  (8/1/18)
DOMESTIC VIOLENCE: Limits the incarceration of victims of domestic violence and sex offenses who refuse to testify against their abusers. (gov sig)
CRIMINAL/PROCEDURE: Provides relative to the payment of fines, fees, costs, restitution, and other monetary obligations related to an offender's conviction
LAW ENFORCE/OFFICERS:  Provides relative to revocation of P.O.S.T. certification
DOMESTIC ABUSE:  Requires those who serve temporary protective orders or protective orders to transmit a service return to the Louisiana Protective Order Registry
WILDLIFE & FISHERIES:  Prohibits the importation of live cervid
BOATS/SHIPS/VESSELS:  Increases boat registration fees
CONDOLENCES: Expresses condolences upon the death of Ralph D. Balentine.
AGRICULTURAL COMMODITIES: Provides for the regulation of industrial hemp (EN INCREASE SD EX See Note)
COMMENDATIONS: Commends and recognizes the Louisiana teams that participated in the 2019 FIRST Robotics Season.
TAX/SALES: Provides for administration, disposition, enforcement, and adjudication of state and local taxes and for the Board of Tax Appeals. (gov sig) (EN DECREASE GF RV See Note)
CRIME/FELONIES:  Amends penalties relative to the crime of hazing (EN SEE FISC NOTE GF EX See Note)
MEDICAID:  Provides for a work and community engagement initiative within the Medicaid program (Item #13) (EG SEE FISC NOTE GF EX See Note)

SPECIAL DAY/WEEK/MONTH: Designates June 4, 2019, as Girl Scouts of the United States of America Day at the state capitol and recognizes the one hundred seventh anniversary of the founding of Girl Scouting
CORONERS:  Authorizes the coroner to obtain blood, urine, or other biological fluids or samples relevant to an investigation. (8/1/18)
POLICE/MUNICIPAL: Provides relative to the powers of the chief of police for the town of Homer
COMMENDATIONS:  Commends TM Landry College Preparatory School, its founders, and students.

HIGHER EDUCATION: Provides for anonymous sexual assault climate surveys at public postsecondary educational institutions
COMMENDATIONS: Commends the Goodwood Property Owners Association of Baton Rouge
CHILDREN: Requests the Department of Children and Family Services to create the "Task Force on Protecting Children from Exposure to Pornography".
COMMENDATIONS:  Commends Lewis Cook on being named to the 2018 Louisiana Sports Hall of Fame.
WEAPONS/FIREARMS:  Provides relative to concealed carry of firearms for qualified retired law enforcement officers
PUBLIC EMPLOYEES:  Provides relative to the definition of a "governmental function". (8/1/18)
HEALTH CARE:  Extends and provides for the Louisiana Obesity Prevention and Management Commission. (gov sig)
MARRIAGE: Provides for parental consent and judicial limitations and authorization for a minimum age for marriage. (8/1/19)
CIVIL/DISCOVERY:  Provides relative to the delays for responding to discovery requests in certain proceedings
ATTORNEY GENERAL:  Provides relative to the protection of computerized data that contains personal information and requires notification of data breaches. (8/1/18)
LEVEES: Memorializes Congress to reassess the entire levee and floodwall system in the southeastern United States.
COMMENDATIONS:  Commends Coach Dale Weiner on his induction into the Louisiana High School Sports Hall of Fame
PRESCRIPTION:  Provides for the acquisition of blighted property in certain municipalities. (gov sig)
